name: agent-on-sentinel-starter
description: Naylence starter template: agent hosted on a sentinel with CLI client

scripts.build: tsc && npm run rename-to-mjs && npm run fix-imports
scripts.dev: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/echo-agent.mjs dotenv_config_path=.env.agent
scripts.smoke: node -r dotenv/config dist/client.mjs dotenv_config_path=.env.client | grep -q 'Hello, World!' && echo '✓ Smoke test passed' || (echo '✗ Smoke test failed' && exit 1)
